price: Kemudian, Dia menyempurnakan dan meniupkan ke dalam (tubuh)nya roh (ciptaan)-Nya dan Dia menjadikan bagi kamu pendengaran, penglihatan, dan hati, (tetapi) kamu sedikit sekali bersyukur.
arabic: ثُمَّ سَوَّىٰهُ وَنَفَخَ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِهِۦۖ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma sawwāhu wanafakha fīhi min rūḥihi wajaʿala lakumu al-samʿa wal-abṣāra wal-afidata qalīlan mā tashkurūna
